name: Slash the Dice | GMTK 2022
description:
What happens in the Casino stays in the Casino, because there is no way to get out of there! Fight your way through the crowds of tough enemies, roll the dice and pray that Lady Luck does not know you by sight.

Slash the Dice is a dynamic Hack'n'Slash platformer in which real-time adaptation is the key to success. The main thing is to throw the dice, and then come what may.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

«There're only three elements!»

The fighting mechanic is based on the coacting of Elements. Using the magic dice you can change the “element” of your spear. Each type of weapon is especially effective against the opposite-type enemy. Although it may come out not too handy as you can even heal the same elemental enemy.

Take control of your luck

In your battles, you may find a bunch of unique dice. Each one can either lead you to the top or drag you to the bottom. Threatening situations will force you to act risky. Make your decisions quick and wise.

Roll 'em all

In this infernal casino alongside the fair and well-balanced dice, there're also some chaotic and ridiculous ones. What will you choose: a safely juicy chance of getting the right element or bet your life on a small possibility of making the ultimate attack. Earn and try each of the dice by yourself.
